snippet.title: Astra And The New Constellation - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Astra on her journey across the galaxy to create a constellation that she can call home, starting on March 1st on Itch.io!

Astra And The New Constellation is a retro-inspired mascot platformer, created entirely in the Pico-8 fantasy console. Run, jump, slide, and glide across 15 unique levels while collecting stardust, avoiding hazards, and learning to control the power of the mysterious Starblocks.


Game by rarelikeaunicorn: https://rarelikeaunicorn.itch.io/
Trailer by SecksWrecks: https://twitter.com/SecksWrecks
Published by Llocin7 Digital: https://twitter.com/llocin7
Pico-8 fantasy console by Zep: https://www.lexaloffle.com/
"Radis Sans" trailer font by Gaël Goy: https://fontesk.com/radis-sans-font/
